title.narrative: Internatonal Council of Voluntary Agencies (ICVA) core contribution 2021-2023

description.narrative:
Denmark’s support for ICVA contributes to the objective of the organisation, which is to make humanitarian action more principled and effective by working collectively and independently to influence policy and practice. ICVA’s vision is a world in which crises-affected populations are effectively protected, assisted, and enabled to rebuild their lives and livelihoods with dignity.
Supporting ICVA in its work to bring civil society organizations together to make humanitarian action more principled and effective.
The partner’s results description and results frameworks are global, general, and highly aggregated and the MFA core contribution is thus reflected in the overall results reporting by the partner. Please refer to the hyperlink below.
https://www.icvanetwork.org/resources/
Supporting ICVA in its work to bring civil society organizations together to make humanitarian action more principled and effective.
